title: iMovies
description: This Online Movie Reservation System aims to simplify the movie booking process, simple interface for user. A seamless online experience for booking tickets, making the entire process enjoyable.

title: Webulance
description: The website speeds up emergency response by connecting users directly to ambulance services, cutting out middlemen. This reduces response time and helps ambulance drivers locate victims quickly using GPS signals.

title: Secure Chat using RSA and Steganorgraphy
description: This project enables users to encrypt text into images using Steganography and RSA. Senders select a recipient, an image, and their message. Recipients generate a decryption key to reveal the hidden text
